title: 【[MineMusic] MCBE Rhysum Game】 - 音乐游戏【1.12】
author: 爱心魔王FHC
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2019-11-5 00:42 编辑 

[MineMusic] MCBE Rhysum GamePreviously The London Dungeons, we have now expanded to include more of Merlin’s Magical London with our new Minecraft recreation – Sea Life London!
The London Dungeon and Sea Life London are both attractions designed to be as enjoyable as possible in the center of London, which we have now recreated into Minecraft.这个音乐游戏的灵感来源于DanceDanceRevolution
你可以通过行走、跳跃来玩这个游戏
游戏中有6首种类多样的歌曲，并且会在将来添加新的歌曲指令编辑作者：Kei (Twitter) (YouTube)
音乐编辑作者：Yoshi (Twitter) (YouTube)歌曲Megalovania -tobyfox
Charles -Balloon
Senbonzakura -kurousaP
A Cruel Angel’s Thesis -Takahashi Youko
Suger Song & Bitter Step -UNISON SQUARE GARDEN
Grand Escape -RADWIMPS图片展示 








视频介绍见百度云游戏版本：1.12下载链接: https://pan.baidu.com/s/1QStGDpV7x1eHL2lAAR8yhw
提取码: m3wg
